params.name: UserName
params.doc: Name of the User to get information about.  This parameter is optional. If it is not included, it defaults to the User making the request.

properties.doc: Contains the result of a successful invocation of the GetUser action.
properties.name: GetUserResult
Path
properties.doc: Path to the User name. For more information about paths, see Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using AWS Identity and Access Management.

properties.name: UserId
properties.doc: The stable and unique string identifying the User. For more information about IDs, see Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using AWS Identity and Access Management.

properties.name: Arn
properties.doc: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the User. For more information about ARNs and how to use them in policies, see Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using AWS Identity and Access Management.
